Description_lang: $?c3[Summoning your Boar refreshes the duration of Mongoose Fury.][]Each time your Boar deals damage, $?c1[the damage of your next Cobra Shot is increased by $472640s1%][you have a $s1% chance to gain a stack of Mongoose Fury] and $?s259387[Mongoose Bite]?a137017[Raptor Strike][Cobra Shot] strikes $?c1[${$472640s2}][${$472640s3}] additional $Ltarget:targets;. Stacks up to $472640u times.$?c3[|cFFFFFFFFMongoose Fury|rIncreases the damage of Mongoose Bite or Raptor Strike by $259388s1% for $259388d, stacking up to $259388u times.][]

description_blz.en_US: Each time your Boar deals damage, the damage of your next Cobra Shot is increased by 25% and Cobra Shot strikes 1 additional target. Stacks up to 4 times.
description_blz.es_MX: Cada vez que tu jabalí inflige daño, el daño de tu siguiente Disparo de cobra aumenta un 25% y Disparo de cobra golpea a 1 objetivo más. Se acumula hasta 4 veces.
description_blz.pt_BR: Sempre que seu Javali causar dano, o dano do seu Disparo da Naja aumenta em 25%, e Disparo da Naja ataca 1 alvo a mais. Acumula até 4 vezes.
description_blz.de_DE: Jedes Mal, wenn Euer Eber Schaden verursacht, ist der Schaden Eures nächsten Einsatzes von 'Kobraschuss' um 25% erhöht und 'Kobraschuss' trifft 1 zusätzliches Ziel. Bis zu 4-mal stapelbar.
description_blz.en_GB: Each time your Boar deals damage, the damage of your next Cobra Shot is increased by 25% and Cobra Shot strikes 1 additional target. Stacks up to 4 times.
description_blz.es_ES: Cada vez que tu jabalí inflige daño, el daño de tu siguiente Disparo de cobra aumenta un 25% y Disparo de cobra golpea a 1 objetivo más. Se acumula hasta 4 veces.
description_blz.fr_FR: Chaque fois que votre sanglier inflige des dégâts, les dégâts de votre prochain Tir de cobra sont augmentés de 25 % et Tir du cobra touche 1 cible supplémentaire. Cumulable jusqu’à 4 fois.
description_blz.it_IT: Ogni volta che il tuo Cinghiale infligge danni, aumenta i danni inflitti dal successivo Tiro del Cobra del 25% e aumenta i bersagli colpiti da Tiro del Cobra di 1. Si accumula fino a 4 volte.
description_blz.ru_RU: Когда ваш вепрь наносит урон, урон от следующего "Выстрела кобры" увеличивается на 25%, а следующий"Выстрел кобры" поражает еще 1 цель. Суммируется до 4 раз.
description_blz.ko_KR: 멧돼지가 피해를 입힐 때마다 다음 코브라 사격의 공격력이 25%만큼 증가합니다. 또한 코브라 사격이 1명의 추가 대상을 공격합니다. 최대 4번까지 중첩됩니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 每次你的野豬造成傷害時，你下一個眼鏡蛇射擊的傷害提高25%，且眼鏡蛇射擊額外擊中1個目標。最多可堆疊4層。
description_blz.zh_CN: 每当你的野猪造成伤害时，使你的下一发眼镜蛇射击伤害提高25%，并使眼镜蛇射击额外攻击1个目标。最多可叠加4层。
